name: What Should I Do? - Story Stage Build Word Puzzle Game
name_original: What Should I Do? - Story Stage Build Word Puzzle Game
description:
This is a game in which you need to find the clues in the words to figure out the real level you need challenge.
* First of all, you will see some words I say to you. I will tell you what I want.

* Secondly, you need to figure out what words are the key words. Tap those words you think is related to the subject to see what happens.

* Once you’ve find all elements you need to finish the level, you can tap, swipe, shake, tap and hold to help me do what I should do.
Remember you need to focus on the words I tell you, otherwise you won’t know a thing about this game.
It’s a word puzzle and brain challenge game which you can play when you are bored or when you want to show others how cool you are.
DESIGN your level and see if other people are just as smart as you.
We will show you how to play the first level, then you can work your way through the rest of the game.
Feel free to contact us at magicfantasyltd@hotmail.com
